name: NokDooM for BOOM
description: This is the 3 first levels of my previous work, Realm of Shades, but modified for work with the mega-awesome port BOOM, by TeamTNT!! It really rocks!!! There's no story, the levels have a kind of continuity but only you need is enter, kill and survive them. Enjoy! Each one of the 3 levels can be finished with 100% kills and 100% secrets starting only with a pistol. Implemented: -Conveyor -Teleporting Items -Underwater Areas -Current -Transparent Walls -Vertical Animated Walls -Multiple Switches -Rooms over Rooms (!) -One Elevator -Use of BLUMAP and GRNMAP, extract from the last version of editutil.zip -2 new switches -A new animated nukage flat (28 frames) -MIDI music store by MUSPUT.EXE (tm) -Scrolling Floors -TOTAL MASSACRE!!!!
